idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 2; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.2.4.1420

descript.abstract: This dataset contains shoreline boundary polygons for Virginia's public fishing lakes. All lakes are accessible for fishing by the general public. These data are formatted as an ArcView shapefile and compiled by the VDGIF Fish and Wildlife Information Services (FWIS). These data are presented as polygons.
descript.purpose: To show locations of public angling opportunities through various cartographic products.

citeinfo.origin: Virginia Department of Game and Inland Fisheries.
citeinfo.title: Virginia's Public fishing lakes

pubinfo.publish: VA Dept. of Game and Inland Fisheries

Use of data in publications, either digital or hardcopy, must be cited as follows: Public Fishing Lakes. 2008. Virginia Department of Game and Inland Fisheries.

attr.attrdef: Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.
Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Origin of polygon spatial data. NWI = national wetlands inventory; NHD = 1:100k USGS National Hydrography Dataset.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Description of boat and/or boat motor restrictions

procstep.procdesc: Lakes were located using information from VDGIF's 'Where to Fish' Public Lake identifier and were reviewed by the GIS Coordinator. Locations were copied from NHD Waterbodies dataset, USFWS National Wetlands Inventory or digitized onto 1:24k scale digital raster graphics (DRGs) or best available aerial photography.

cntperp.cntorg: Virginia Dept. of Game and Inland Fisheries

srcinfo.srccontr: Current listing of Public Fishing Lakes open to anglers in the state of Virginia.

citeinfo.origin: Fisheries Division, Virginia Department of Game and Inland Fisheries
citeinfo.title: List of Public Fishing Lakes

srcinfo.srccontr: Provided polygons and attribute tables representing Virgina Public Fishing Lakes.
Provided ploygons and attribute tables for watebodies representing Virgina Public Fishing Lakes.

dataqual.complete: No warranty, expressed or implied, is made regarding the accuracy, adequacy, completeness, reliability, or usefulness of any data provided. These data are provided on an "as is" basis. All warranties of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to fitness for a particular use, freedom from computer viruses, and non-infringement of proprietary rights, are disclaimed. Data are added and changed periodically, and data may become out-of-date quickly. It is recommended that the user not let a significant period of time elapse between obtaining and using the data. Data was comprised using the most current listings of public lakes from http://www.dgif.virginia.gov/fishing/waterbodies/ . These listings are subject to frequent and unanounced changes, which may affect lake status.
